TextView.android:text: Southport Opening times: Open all year round Lifeguard cover: Yes Parking: On site parking - Beach parking off Marine Drive, Southport, £4.50-£6.00 (seasonal). Beach parking closed at high tides. Beachfront parking, pay and display, all year round. Dog friendly: Yes. Poop scoop area and there are some dog free zones. Toilets: Yes, in Ocean Plaza Local shops: Southport is a very big and busy town with lost of shops, cafes, pubs and restaurants Ice cream: Ice cream vans are on the beach and also there are several in town, Rossi's is a favourite
